Key Match Events: Patrick Dorgu scored a debut goal a minute after coming off the bench.
Nico Elvedi received a red card after a VAR review for a foul on Kasper Dolberg.
Jonas Wind had a goal disallowed for offside in the 72nd minute.
Granit Xhaka was dismissed in the 87th minute after receiving a second yellow card.
Pierre-Emile Højbjerg scored a stoppage-time goal to secure the victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Denmark's victory left them top of the group after a scoreless draw between Spain and Serbia.
The match was held at Parken Stadium in Copenhagen, Denmark with an attendance of 26,024.
